sources.ms_copies_parts: Dresden, Sächsische Landesbibliothek, Mus. 3490/Q/1. 'Six quatuors pour le clavecin ou pianoforte, violon, viola et basse obligé composés par Luigi Boccherini'. (18th century)

partial_notes: This page shows entry 259 which contains six quartets for harpsichord (or pianoforte), violin, viola and 'cello as arrangements of the six string quartets Op. 26 of 1778. No reference in Boccherini's autograph catalogue. The author of these remarkable arrangements is unknown. All six quartets are listed with their keys and tempos, referencing the original string quartet numbers (Nos. 195-200).
